jobs.name: Morning Morpheus Brief
jobs.description: Daily overview of MOR, network health, and ecosystem

payload.message: Generate my daily Morpheus briefing. 1) MOR price and 24h change. 2) Local node status — is the proxy router responding? Which models are available? 3) Gateway status — is api.mor.org responding? 4) Staking rewards update if tracked. 5) Any notable Morpheus ecosystem news — new MRCs, protocol updates, provider changes. 6) Inference quality note — any issues with model responses observed recently? Keep it technical and concise.

jobs.name: Node Health Check
jobs.description: Periodic check that local Morpheus node is running

payload.message: Quick node health check. Ping the local proxy router at http://127.0.0.1:8083/v1/models. If it responds, note which models are available and skip sending a message. If it's DOWN, alert me immediately with the error. Also check the Morpheus Gateway at https://api.mor.org/api/v1 as backup status.

jobs.name: Weekly Morpheus Ecosystem Report
jobs.description: Weekly deep dive on Morpheus network metrics and developments

payload.message: Weekly Morpheus ecosystem report. 1) MOR price: weekly performance and trend. 2) Network metrics: active providers, models available, inference volume if available. 3) GitHub activity: new MRCs, significant PRs, community discussions. 4) Staking summary: rewards accrued this week, current APY estimate. 5) Competitive landscape: any notable developments from other decentralized inference projects (Bittensor, Akash, etc.). 6) Inference cost comparison: Morpheus vs centralized API pricing for our most-used models.
